name: John Vavrinak
text: Always great food, great customer service,  and reasonable prices.

name: Ben Nageotte
text: Great pizza and service as usual.. friendly over the phone. Great delivery driver, made this transaction awsome for my small get together with family.

name: Angie Chan
text: The amazing food and friendly delivery drivers.

name: challenger 5711
text: Been in Austintown going on 20 yrs, Pizza Hut & a locally owned pizza shop weâ€™re the only ones I would get pizza from.  This place has been going downhill for last few years.....made the mistake of giving it another shot.....still dark and dingy inside and toppings were skimped on beyond belief.

name: Sam Schaefer
text: By far my favorite Pizza Hut in the Austintown/Canfield area. The food is always great, and the employees are usually extremely nice and funny! I've been going to this pizza hut for about 18 years at least and I've always loved it, much more than others!

name: Lois Mayer
text: Nothing.  Food was hot and ready when we picked it up

name: Wackyred35 Ties
text: Clean and very nice staffing there. Food was great.

name: Lion Heart
text: I've always loved Pizza Hut from the taste of the food to the atmosphere that is presented. This location is not typically jammed packed which is good for getting pizza when you're hungry. No long waits and service is very good.

name: Christine Hippo
text: was very garlicky it ended up in trash

name: Bryan Wright
text: When I'm writing a review of a major chain like this I'm never sure how to base my review.  Am I judging Pizza Hut, or THIS Pizza Hut? â€¦More

name: Elizabeth Ann
text: The pizza and chicken wings were the most expensive and horrible tasting examples of both I have ever had. We ordered carry out. We were too tired from the road to argue about how horrible tasting it was. We didn't even eat it. The employee was very kind and hard working, tho. I wouldn't recommend this place.

name: kandirmcg
text: We tried their Friday night buffet.... wasn't worth $42. We will not be going back. The waitress was nice. But, there were only two types of pizza on the line and many waiting in line for it. The pasta was soupy.

name: Jennifer Rabbitts
text: Will most likely never visit this Pizza Hut again, the manger on duty in the afternoons is incompetent and does not know how to do their job, if I decide to use Pizza Hut again, it will be one further down the road. I would rather travel further than I would use this Pizza Hut again.

name: trudi summers
text: The staff that was there was amazing. I had a family emergency and had to leave for a short time. When I came back they were Beyond caring concern and truly helpful.

name: Tracy A Gearhart
text: Thanks Pizza hut, my birthday Lunch with my Mom was just perfect. Original Pan Crust pizza just like when I was a kid...

name: Diane Ceccarelli
text: Almost tasted like the old days..... best pizza ever!

name: Loco Max
text: Great wings and pizza here. They serve WingStreet wings. They got a great salad bar. Pizza buffet is awesome here. The online menu deals are amazing too. Most people don't know that the deal menu changes depending on location you pick. They â€¦More

name: Robin Tedders
text: Bad service on the manger from the manger on 12/21 at 8pm, two pizzas came out wrong,waited an hour to get our pizza. The manger never came out to see if the new pizza was okay...he stood in the back and gave us 4 off,the waitress was great â€¦More

name: Laura Lovely
text: So.  The table service is terrible!...  I was at a table of 6 it was my brothers birtday. The place was not busy at all. Yet our water barely got refiled we had to ask every time & also had to repeat our order several times. NO TRASH WAS â€¦More

text: Great pizza and service

name: Sima Rainbolt
text: Great food and a friendly staff.  The pizza is great - nice, crispy crust.  We love going here for lunch as its pretty close to the office and they are always quick to serve.  Give 'em a try - it's worth it!

name: melissa bresky
text: Good wish the food was hotter.  Came in on a Friday night for the buffet once again it was like warm pizza.  However they did put a hot cheese one and as we were getting ready to leave hot pasta.   Once again I was disappointed.

text: Pizza was great workers were nice and friendly I'll go back

text: This restaurant was dirty. We went in middle of afternoon, only 1 other table with 2 people and I saw at least 3 dirty tables, there was ice under our table, salad bar had stuff all over it. Even the picture on the wall by our table had â€¦More
